desc: Shop our Essential range now. Contactless payment and delivery, or click and collect.

layout.text: DUE TO OUR EXTREMELY LARGE SELCTION OF PRODUCTS WE HAVE ONLY ADDED THE BASICS TO OUR ONLINE STORE. HOWEVER, ALL OF OUR IN STORE PRODUCTS ARE STILL AVAILABLE TO PURCHASE, IF YOU CANNOT FIND WHAT YOU NEED ONLINE PLEASE CONTACT US AND WE WILL DO OUR BEST TO SUPPLY YOU WITH WHAT WE CAN AT THIS DIFFICULT TIME.
